data.title: Comedy | The best British comedy shows, comedy movies and US sitcoms | Channel 4
data.meta_description: Watch the best British comedy shows, US comedies and funny movies
data.text:
Comedy prequel to The Big Bang Theory about the gifted but eccentric younger Sheldon

US comedy drama. An aspiring writer is thrust into the superficial world of high fashion.

Classic comedy. Dr Frasier Crane is bright and successful. So what could go wrong? Well...

US sitcom. The arrival of a beautiful new neighbour throws two nerdy flatmates for a loop.

Ray Barone has it all: beautiful family, great job, nice house - and his parents next door

Can the Smiling Friends bring happiness to a bizarre and colourful world?

US comedy recalling the wonder years of geeky Adam and his eccentric 80s suburban family

Sitcom following the lives of delivery driver Doug, his wife Carrie and her eccentric dad

Comedians and chums Joe, Sal, Murr and Q compete to embarrass each other in public

Paul Abbott's classic drama about the rollercoaster lives and loves of the Gallagher clan

(2014) Comedy sequel. The boys head to Australia, where Jay claims to be a famous DJ...

US comedy about class, capitalism and one man's quest to achieve the American dream

They're unique, they're extraordinary and they're yellow. Say hello to the Simpsons.

US sitcom about four aliens posing as an average family. Starring John Lithgow.

Mug punters beware. The PhoneShop is ready, and most definitely open for business...

US comedy about feisty young chef Gabi from San Francisco, who works for millionaire Josh

Surreal cult sitcom, with more pop culture references than you can shake a light sabre at

Greg Davies' comedy series about a childish idiot whose world is on the brink of collapse

Signed episodes of the smash-hit adolescent comedy about a bunch of lads behaving sadly

US sitcom with Michael J. Fox, revolving around the mayor of NYC and his oddball staff

(2017) Comedy with Matt Damon. To live the high life, a couple get shrunk down in size.

Red Guy, Yellow Guy and Duck learn all there is to know, in this comedy-horror puppet show

Six-year-old Tommy doesn't know that his dog Mr Pickles has a murderous evil streak

Hull-arious female-led comedy following the joyously chaotic Toni, Rana and Paula

Comedy. A mum of two finds out she's menopausal and goes to live in the forest.

Eric Andre hosts the most chaotic, unorthodox and surreal comedy chat show around
